episodes.title: U.S. lawmakers view unredacted Department of Justice files on Epstein
episodes.description:
CGTN’s Elaine Reyes speaks to Mindy Gulati, the CEO of Fundamental Advisory and a criminal defense attorney. They discuss the international implications and political fallout over the notorious case of Jeffrey Epstein.
#World Today
